11f054b6-9954-49d6-90cf-3538b16ecf0f.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated an understanding of major moral theories and their application to real world problems. The earner recognizes the importance of moral behavior, and the need for individuals and organisations to apply ethical reasoning in the workplace.
11f054b6-9954-49d6-90cf-3538b16ecf0f.name: Ethical Reasoning - Associate Ormond College

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in 8 hours of interactive ethical workshops focused on workplace behaviours.

f91ed3f2-719b-4f2e-b705-87afd2a1369b.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated an understanding of, and ability to apply the principles involved in creating high performing teams. This includes knowledge of MBTI, RACI charts, and NLP, and their strategic uses for role allocation, team problem solving, motivation, communication, and conflict resolution.
f91ed3f2-719b-4f2e-b705-87afd2a1369b.name: Building Strong Teams - Associate Ormond College

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in 8 hours of interactive and collaborative learning on the theory and practice of team building.

3f0e70bc-c786-4420-b7f6-85d6d062be04.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated an understanding of the fundamentals of effective public speaking. Using Narrative as an underlying structure, the earner knows how to adapt to different audiences, use audiovisual support, control projection and pronunciation, and employ rhetorical techniques to engage listeners.
3f0e70bc-c786-4420-b7f6-85d6d062be04.name: Public Speaking - Associate Ormond College

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in 8 hours of interactive public speaking and communication workshops.

aec74084-1bf0-4ec3-b98c-f4ae7decad5b.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated an understanding of the application of innovation strategies and concepts to the design and delivery of solutions to complex challenges. The earner understands the importance of leadership principles, empathy, and teamwork in the innovation process and has learned the frameworks, mindsets, and behaviours required to evoke positive change. This program was delivered by the Wade Institute of Entrepreneurship.
aec74084-1bf0-4ec3-b98c-f4ae7decad5b.name: Innovation Challenge

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in 20 hours of interactive and collaborative Innovation and Leadership education.

b9939983-636a-43a2-a437-c6db9c550ed7.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated quantitative and qualitative interdisciplinary research skills. With guidance from key industry professionals, the earner has worked independently and collaboratively in order to contribute to a civil liberties policy recommendation paper.
b9939983-636a-43a2-a437-c6db9c550ed7.name: Law and Policy Research - Associate Ormond College

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in 40 hours of law and policy research and related workshops.

1532b603-364f-4f29-b465-39dcd54893ae.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated an understanding of the logical structure in reasoning that is central to critical thinking. They can analyse arguments, identify flaws and strengths, and present a clear case when advocating for a certain position.
1532b603-364f-4f29-b465-39dcd54893ae.name: Critical Thinking - Associate Ormond College

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in 8 hours of interactive critical thinking workshops, tasks, and assessment.

586bd0d1-8451-4ee9-bcc2-35369cf46442.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated an understanding of how to apply brand archetypes and brand purpose methodology in developing a personal brand. The earner can adapt these methods in social media communication to ensure authentic communication across multiple platforms including Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and LinkedIn. They have demonstrated the ability to apply platform-appropriate short and long-form content.
586bd0d1-8451-4ee9-bcc2-35369cf46442.name: Personal Brand Development - Associate Ormond College

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in 8 hours of interactive workshops of brand theory and practical implementation, and present a personal brand executed across multiple social media platforms.

02135f4d-0880-488b-bc39-383335883fe6.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated the ability to analyse, interpret, and present data accurately. The earner understands the basics of Microsoft Excel for data analysis, and can present information in graphical form.
02135f4d-0880-488b-bc39-383335883fe6.name: Data Literacy - Associate Ormond College

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in 8 hours of interactive data analysis and presentation using Microsoft Excel, and complete an assessment task.

1f7dc490-fdbe-48ea-8fc2-d64e4d25cce4.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated an understanding of aspects of planning for and promoting change within global, local, and virtual communities. This earner understands the importance of anticipating stakeholder needs within a specific context, community consultation, action planning and revision, measuring success, and the role of social media in promoting change.
1f7dc490-fdbe-48ea-8fc2-d64e4d25cce4.name: Community Action - Associate Ormond College

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 8 hours of collaborative workshops and tasks on planning for change in a range of communities, and prepare and present a Community Action Plan in teams.

ee90673e-a4cf-49f9-82f3-c1c3f772131d.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated an understanding of the demands of the modern workplace. By engaging in a variety of workshops, networking opportunities and related events, they understand career development and what is expected in the world of work.
ee90673e-a4cf-49f9-82f3-c1c3f772131d.name: World of Work - Associate Ormond College

badge_template_activities.title: Attend 8 hours of professional development workshops, networking functions, and guests speaker events over a year.

094ebc08-73f3-451c-ae44-70024a03bacd.description: The earner of this badge has developed workplace skills through a hands-on experience with a public and/or private organisations that provides assistance and advocacy in their community. The earner has developed professional skills, as well as knowledge and understanding of community needs, social problems and issues through a combination of in-class learning and on-site work.
094ebc08-73f3-451c-ae44-70024a03bacd.name: Community Engagement - Associate Ormond College

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 3 hours of preparatory modules, plus 8 hours of volunteering experience.

3e7e770e-500b-4b5f-a9d6-153136e6e2e0.description: The earner of this badge has learned basic computer programming concepts, including building and retaining programming logic and applying theoretical knowledge into actual code writing. The earner has also demonstrated a foundation of coding knowledge for future application in various professional fields.
3e7e770e-500b-4b5f-a9d6-153136e6e2e0.name: Introduction to Coding - Associate Ormond College

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in 8 hours of interactive and collaborative coding and programming workshops.

e5e91fb8-7710-4a9a-ac89-507b42ab44bf.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated an understanding of diversity and inclusion from the intersection of race, sexuality, gender, beliefs, and behaviours. The earner has shown awareness, knowledge, and ability to maximise the value of diversity and inclusion within the workplace.
e5e91fb8-7710-4a9a-ac89-507b42ab44bf.name: Diversity & Inclusion - Associate Ormond College

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in 8 hours of interactive and collaborative workshops on the theory and practice of diversity and inclusion within the workplace.

5a5b9a41-3cc6-4a75-91cd-0d67f71093d9.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated an understanding about the world of finance and basic economic concepts that inform policy and decisions. The earner can apply these insights to personal financial management by making better informed decisions about investing, accounting, budget, credit, and taxes. They have demonstrated their competency by developing and presenting a 7 point personal financial plan.
5a5b9a41-3cc6-4a75-91cd-0d67f71093d9.name: Financial Literacy - Associate Ormond College

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in 8 hours of interactive learning workshops and prepare a personal financial plan applying the 7 key concepts taught throughout the course.

93f572ef-5a59-44b1-9d0c-0f4e8ef053c1.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated an understanding of Acceptance Commitment Therapy (ACT) which forms the basis of developing skills in flexible thinking. They have learned how to engage in their work and studies more flexibly; derive greater meaning and vitality from their work and studies; and make connections between their values and work/study related actions.
93f572ef-5a59-44b1-9d0c-0f4e8ef053c1.name: Thinking Flexibly for Success - Associate Ormond College

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 8-hours of in-class learning, with learners encouraged to apply skills learned outside of the classroom.

779e5759-c617-4685-8e13-b05a26214eb1.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated the ability to collaborate in a small team to analyse a complex real-world problem, determine an innovative solution, and present a persuasive argument.
779e5759-c617-4685-8e13-b05a26214eb1.name: Case Competition - Associate Ormond College

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in 8 hours of interactive and collaborative problem solving, policy analysis, and public presenting.

6230e60f-bea4-4882-8ef9-eeb3b60974ab.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated skills in presenting online presentations effectively over platforms such as Zoom. They have developed the ability to use a digital platform such as Zoom to deliver persuasive presentations; employ a range of techniques relevant to online presentations; understand how to reach and persuade an audience; structure presentations for maximum effectiveness; and how to warm up, and prepare physically and psychologically.
6230e60f-bea4-4882-8ef9-eeb3b60974ab.name: Presenting Persuasively Online - Associate Ormond College

badge_template_activities.title: This subject is delivered on Zoom in weekly 1-hour instalments over an 8-week period.

73adde13-f505-4853-bf19-9d3b4b58ac93.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated an understanding of the fundamentals of the Australian legal system, collaborated in small teams to address real-world legal problems, and can apply knowledge of legal principles to policy and practice in business and politics.
73adde13-f505-4853-bf19-9d3b4b58ac93.name: Introduction to Law - Associate Ormond College

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in 8 hours of interactive and collaborative legal workshops including research, problem solving, and presenting to a panel.

423ae298-4296-4b35-b7a7-acf3dc784971.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated an ability to understand dynamics encountered in social settings and how to effectively communicate with varying personalities. This has been explored through concepts derived from Dialectical Behaviour Therapy, and in practising assertive communication, perspective taking, and dialectical thinking.
423ae298-4296-4b35-b7a7-acf3dc784971.name: Interpersonal Effectiveness - Associate Ormond College

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in 8 hours of interactive workshops exploring and applying concepts from Dialectical Behaviour Therapy, and sharing a written reflection of personal learning to the group.

4b8c6ab4-4bb9-4543-8fa3-87ef57da576d.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated an understanding of early-stage career planning and development. The earner has learned professional writing and verbal communication skills, and understands the elements of job search processes, building relevant capacities, and the importance of networking.
4b8c6ab4-4bb9-4543-8fa3-87ef57da576d.name: Career Management - Associate Ormond College

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in 8 hours of career planning including application writing and interview techniques, identifying and responding to behavioural questions, and developing career options.

bcd64794-564e-49b2-b09d-5e0d7620e902.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated an understanding of the power of communicating effectively in writing in the workplace. The earner understands the conventions of particular types of writing and how to use them, and how to avoid common spelling, punctuation and grammar pitfalls that detract from good writing.
bcd64794-564e-49b2-b09d-5e0d7620e902.name: Effective Written Communications - Associate Ormond College

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in 8 hours of interactive workshops to help you understand the power of good writing in the workplace, and learn how to produce a range of punchy writing that convinces, informs, persuades and gets results.

a8310a0e-df9f-479b-8784-b6b608af5e91.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated an understanding that effective career development is a multifaceted process that involves enhancing self-awareness, discovering, and strengthening skills and attributes, to successfully enter the world of work.
a8310a0e-df9f-479b-8784-b6b608af5e91.name: Career Development - Associate Ormond College

badge_template_activities.title: Attend 8 hours of professional development workshops, networking functions, and guests speaker events over a year.

8f962640-24a8-43f1-afdf-4edbc2400ef2.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated an understanding of the demands of the modern workplace. By engaging in a variety of workshops, networking opportunities and related events, they understand career development and what is expected in the world of work. The earner of this badge has completed the World of Work program for the 2nd time, totaling 16 hours of attendance.
8f962640-24a8-43f1-afdf-4edbc2400ef2.name: World of Work Level 2 - Associate Ormond College

badge_template_activities.title: Attend 16 hours of professional development workshops, networking functions, and guests speaker events over 2 years.
